projects.title: LynkTown App and  website
projects.description: Lynk Town is a comprehensive  digital platform that connects  fashion designers and customers.

summary.heading: Lynk Town is a comprehensive  digital platform that connects <br class='hidden lg:block'/> fashion designers and customers.
points: First connections are made via social media, and customers can place orders using the designer's link. Where customers receive personalised products delivered to their door.

Lynk Town app was created for people who can't keep up with technological changes and are concerned about customer dissatisfaction from online stores, and there was no platform for them to Start and expand their business online safely because vendors could not trust clients and vice versa.

problem.heading: Why to design this website?
points: Poor communication b/w vendor & customer
Hard to manage order payments, shipping, returns, alterations, and more
No personalized approach for customers
Hard to get customized products and orders
Customers worry on receiving wrong products, payment to sellers
Trouble for new vendors to scale brand  globally.

projects.title: Amaar Property App
projects.description: Amaar property offers high-quality apartments and office spaces

summary.heading: Amaar property offers high-quality  apartments and office spaces
points: Amaar Construction Company is our client. It offers high-quality apartments and office spaces in the UAE. The client eventually realised that dealing with residents offline was no longer necessary.
As a result, they approached us to design a system that would convert client relationships to a digital format.

problem.heading: Why to design this app?
points: Fake listings are a common issue when looking for a home. It is frustrating and time-consuming to visit multiple properties in the hopes of finding the one listed by the broker.
Estate agents are not always forthcoming with details, which can be frustrating.
The budget is usually less than the price of the location and the picture of the apartment that the tenants planned for.
The exact location is unknown. The main issue was their inability to quickly track their daily issues.
The ordeal does not end with the acquisition of the ideal property; undocumented rules imposed by society, as well as miscommunication with brokers and owners, continue to vex.

points.heading: Impress with Efficient UX/UI Design
points.description: We strived to provide stunning UX/UI solutions within simple yet effective real estate app.

points.heading: Property management Services
points.description: All services are available for viewing and ordering by users.This app can be used to provide services such as home booking, home rental, and home services such as plumbing, lighting, and so on. This app provides access to all services.

projects.description: IWOWD is a digital ecosystem for fashion and lifestyle that includes a mobile app and a website. Customers can shop for women's fashion wear based on their body measurements, as well as incredible designer jewellery and accessories.

problem.heading: Why to design this Web App?
points: Eye-catching fashion and lifestyle website designs earn more repeat visitors and more revenue for website owners.

Customers return an estimated 40% of what they buy online, mostly because of sizing, style, and fit. Most of them use fit predictors, and size charts, and still over a third regularly buy more than one size/style of the same item.

The User Experience of the given problem is to evaluate the usability of the online clothes sizing, design and implement a simple realistic solution using research obtained through user interviews, competitive research, and usability tests.
Getting more clients.
Define the user path and functional responses to problems.
Creation of the information architecture and the user flow(s)

points.heading: Minimalist Fashione-commerce web app that is easy to use Customers.
points: This website's goal was to connect its audience with the best products available based on their needs and from the best vendors.
Through an eco-friendly and environmentally sustainable business model, their vision was to meet the needs of customers and vendors while maintaining the highest industry standards.
Clothing incorporates all aspects of fashionistas and fits their exact body measurements.
They aim to develop a platform that connects fashion lifestyle segments and vendors with prospective customers.

points: Lack of customer support
Connection established between vendor and customer through social media.

projects.title: Boost the speed of your website by 97% and Conversion Rate by 9.7%
projects.description: RFQ is a B2B Web Application to provide a total procurement solution for engineering companies and industries a like.

summary.heading: RFQ is a B2B Web Application to provide a total procurement solution for engineering companies and industries a like.
points: They require a platform for buyers and sellers where the customer can give his requirement, the admin reviews it and passes it on to suppliers, suppliers submit bids to the admin, and the admin processes it and gives the customer a quote. When a customer accepts the quote and makes the payment on the RFQ platform, the supplier is notified and the work begins. When the work is finished, the customer marks the request as complete.

problem.heading: Why to design this Website?
points: The client wants a home page that includes information about them, how to contact them, why they should choose them, customer FAQs, supplier FAQs, and a slider section. It should also include registration buttons for customers and suppliers.
Improve overall aesthetic and user experience and make the site more authentic and engaging.
Drive conversion of site visitors into contacts and ultimately customers.
Establish SEO foundations to increase search engine traffic and drive future growth.
An impressive UI that’s uncluttered and simple to use with neatly designed dashboards.
A growing platform requires expertise on multiple fronts, requiring a dedicated software team to be available at all times.

points.heading: Provide a total procurement solution for engineering companies and industries.
points: They require a web application to provide a total procurement solution for engineering companies and industries.
The home page should have a section about us, contact us, why choose us, Customer FAQ, Supplier FAQ and a slider section.
It should also contain buttons for customer and supplier registration.
Easily navigable website to make it useful for farmers.

solutions.description: We planned the user testing sessions and the main screens that needed to be created for those testing days. We created a platform for buyers and sellers where the customer can submit his requirements, the admin reviews them and forwards them to suppliers, suppliers submit bids to the admin, and the admin processes them and provides a quote to the customer. When the customer accepts the quote and pays on the RFQ platform, the supplier is notified, and the work begins. When the work is finished, the customer marks the request as completed.

points: Boost site speed to 97% during launch; boost conversion rate to 9.7%.Enhanced user productivity.
Sales have increased.
Lower customer support costs.

projects.review: To provide a great user experience, you must remain relevant to what people are looking for and then build your website around that, which I believe you did and which has allowed us to achieve these successful results.
